name: Alien Infiltration IV
overview: A selective answers adventure by Cheryl de Boissiere and published in Loadstar #188. You again take the role of Lea Lison, star reporter, hot shot newspaperwoman. Some time ago you were contacted by Tolsen, street snitch who led you to toxic dumping, eco-terrorists -- the story was going in a wild direction and you lead the way, making all the tough decisions. Where will the story take us, only you can help us get to the exciting conclusion of the Alien Infiltration Saga.
